availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Ripley, Brown County, Ohio. A grocer. Born in Mifflin County, Pennsylvania. Married Sarah Ann Wilson Campbell. Father of Esther (Hemphill) Kautz and Joseph Newton Hemphill.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 17.

Find A Grave, Entry for Samuel Hemphill (1814-1879), Find A Grave Memorial # 10063931, Maplewood Cemetery, Ripley, Brown County, Ohio, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=HEM&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=37&GScntry=4&GSsr=1801&GRid=10063931& (accessed 30 June 2017).
